# Simple Todo Application

Build a task management web application with the following features:

## Features

Users can:
- Create new tasks with title and description
- Mark tasks as complete or incomplete
- Delete tasks they no longer need
- Filter tasks by status (all, active, completed)
- Search tasks by title

## Technical Requirements

- **Frontend**: React with hooks for state management
- **Storage**: Browser localStorage for data persistence
- **Design**: Clean, responsive interface that works on mobile and desktop
- **Validation**: Basic form validation (required fields, character limits)
- **Error Handling**: User-friendly error messages

## Success Criteria

- Users can manage their daily tasks efficiently
- Data persists across browser sessions
- Interface is intuitive and requires no tutorial
- Works on modern browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari)
